ComicInfo.Summary:
Overview The origin of Synn, the Girl From LSD is recapped in "Girl Talk". Strange alien apparitions are the result of Synn's powerful mind in stasis, so the FemForce's sorceress supreme, Nightveil vows to take her to a dimension (Everglades) where her mind will be left free to expand. Guest stars Stella Stargaze and T.C. Fremont, Janice Lawson, The Brotherhood Of Purity and Dr. Farkas, with cameos of Atoman and Alizarin Crimson. Story and inks by Bill Black, with pencils by Robert Walker (Meteor Man). Color cover by Walker and Black, full color throughout.
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-03-16 15:44:08. [CVDB26299]
